messages.subject: Life is learning!
messages.msgSnippet: LIfe is learning... Unschooling --- learning--- isn t set at an age limit, I didn t think! Preschool, post school.. whatever age.. I am 40 and still learning..
messages.messageBody:
LIfe is learning...
Unschooling --- learning--- isn't set at an age limit, I didn't think!
Preschool, post school.. whatever age..
I am 40 and still learning.. UNSCHOOLING!
Doesn't matter the age, does it?
Let's not pick such pettiness to argue over.
Ned, obviously, likes getting your goats, is my observation...
Silence often neutralizes these types..
No flame.. no fire..

We should all have an in person get together.. at Ned's :-)
You'd love it, right Ned?
We'll all be over at T'giving time.. :-)

Keep laughing! Keep smiling!!
Life is too short to lose out on joy and laughter..
Lighten up, folks! :-)

Bj


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
